channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken car abandoned for over 4month, 17th July
item.description:
This has been left completely smashed on the car park. This is stopping other users and look really awful and untidy.

item.title: Road works and no one working., 17th July
item.description:
Theu have put temporary traffic lights on lower sloane street and pimlico road cross roads plus this includes holbein place. And there is nothing happening. This small roadworks is causing huge back logs in traffic

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Whistler Square, Belgravia, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins on pavement, 17th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbey Crescent, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road sinking at site of old repair, 17th July
item.description:
The road surface on the downhill side of North Hill, just after the pedestrian crossing, has sunk deeply (six to nine inches?) at the site of an old repair (originally Thames Water works). Easiest to see this from the traffic island where the drop is quite sharp. I think the dry weather has caused subsidence around the water installation and we may end up with a sinkhole

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, North Hill, Muswell Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Van fly tipping, 17th July
item.description:
CX58 XFW pulled up, white male late 50/60s started dumping a load of construction rubbish. Roof felt, chairs etc. When I confronted him, he began aggressive but stopped unloading the rest of the van. He has done it loads of time before but unable to prove.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Marlborough Avenue, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole cover, 17th July
item.description:
Manhole cover is loose and every time a car goes over it, it makes a loud noise.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Bridge Place, Victoria, London

item.title: Huge gap in paving slabs between 36-40 Shuttle Close, 17th July
item.description:
My son has just tripped and badly injured his arm and leg due to this huge gap in the pavement that his scooter wheel got caught in and sent him flying. He was in a lot of pain and very distraught

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Shuttle Close, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hoarding between houses 13 and 19, 17th July
item.description:
Extreme hoarding now completely blocking footpath. There’s also lots of rubbish dumped on this street daily, clothes and furniture strewn about. There are signs saying the street is monitored for safety but I can’t see any cameras or people doing patrols.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stonebridge Road, West Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet
